title: [Android.Views] Refresh the surface when recreated
body:
**Description of Change**

Make sure to request a redraw when the surface is created. This is not an issue when there is an update thread running.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1232

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

Fixes the issue
